user.title: Add Hughes Power Watchdog
user.description: Select your Power Watchdog from the list below. Gen 1 (PM*) and Gen 2 (WD_*) models are supported in both 30A and 50A configurations. If your device doesn't appear, ensure it is plugged in and not connected to the phone app.

error.no_devices_found: No Power Watchdog devices found nearby.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Check range and phone app connection.
